id.description: The unique identifier assigned to the popup.

title.description: The title or name of the popup displayed to users.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the popup was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the popup was last updated.

conversion_identifier.description: The identifier associated with the conversion event triggered by the popup.

status.description: The current status of the popup (e.g., active, inactive, expired).

trigger.description: The event or action that triggers the display of the popup.
